description: Worker's compensation case management system for Worksafe Victoria
notes: This file tracks progress across coding sessions
Coding agents should read this file at session start
Update this file with session summaries before ending

on_session_start: Run pwd to verify working directory is /home/user/GPNET3
Read this progress file to understand current state
Read features.json to see what's done and pending
Run git log --oneline -10 to see recent commits
Run npm run test to verify environment is working
Check global_state.tests_passing before starting new work
on_session_end: Ensure all changes are committed with descriptive messages
Update features.json - only mark passes:true if verified
Add a session entry summarizing what was accomplished
Leave codebase in a clean, committable state
critical_rules: NEVER remove or edit feature definitions in features.json
ONLY change the 'passes' status from false to true
NEVER mark a feature as passing without verification
Work on ONE feature at a time
If tests fail, fix them before moving to next feature
